Title: On the maximal inequalities of Burkholder, Davis and Gundy
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd.We give a proof of the maximal inequalities of Burkholder, Davis and Gundy for real as well as Hilbert-space-valued local martingales using almost only stochastic calculus. Some parts, especially in the infinite dimensional case, appear to be original.
